page.title: 12TODAYS TOYS
page.content: Many of the toys today are very modern such as Action Man, Technic Lego, Scalectrix and battery powered models like Stompers, Tri-ex and Rough Riders. Technic Lego is a construction toy with details like pistons, differentials and fans. You can also fit motors to make models work. The pistons work too, they go up and down or in and out. Some of the models you can make are a breakdown truck, a tractor, a forklift and a car chassis. The Rough Riders are battery powered models of cars and motorbikes. They move quite quickly so you have to walk to keep up with them. Tri-ex is like Rough Riders but it has gears and can be changed from two wheel drive to four wheel drive.
